reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits true to size, is comfortable, and appreciate its style, with one noting its body-hugging design. The fabric quality receives mixed feedback - while some find it soft, others say it's cheap. The dressiness and length aspects also get mixed reviews, with one customer noting it's perfect for formal events while another finds it not dressy enough for their occasion. The color receives positive feedback, and several customers mention the material is very thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress and nice fabric
items.body: Beautiful and very comfortable dress. I am 5'7 and 120 lbs and I ordered it in a medium and large. I kept the medium I felt like it was sized very well. A beautiful blue color and perfect for the holidays. Having enough that you don't have to worry about things showing through. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long Black Bodycon Dress with Long Sleeves
items.body: This long black dress is absolutely stunning. Its body-hugging design enhances the silhouette in a very flattering and elegant way, while the long sleeves add a touch of sophistication. It’s perfect for formal events, evening outings, or special occasions. The fabric feels soft and high quality, offering a comfortable fit that shapes the body without feeling too tight. The classic black color makes it incredibly versatile and easy to style with heels, boots, or statement accessories. This dress is a timeless wardrobe staple that never goes out of style. Read more
items.author: Dayana

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Runs big
items.body: The xs is huge Read more
items.author: Allyssa Defillipo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft Fabric, Comfortable & Inexpensive!
items.body: My girlfriend ordered this dress for a work holiday party and she loved it! She’s 5’2 and ordered an extra small. She said the size couldn’t have been better between the length and stretchiness it provided. It’s a soft fabric and very comfortable to wear. Read more
items.author: Andrew B

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice
items.body: Too large, knit like fabric. Not dressy enough for my occasion. Stretches, comfortable but too large. Read more
items.author: Nickki

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dress is beautiful material is cheap
items.body: This dress is stunning! The large size was slightly loose so that was nice. It's super comfortable so wearing it all night was great. I didn't bring a jacket and I was still warm for the evening event. But it's made of T-shirt material and kind of see through so the quality can be found wanting. Read more
items.author: Sarah A.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again
items.body: I’m 5’2” 135-140lbs curvy. I got a size S & it fit great! It’s really stretchy , if there was an da I could’ve pulled it off. The material is soft , very thin and a bit see through. The turtle neck wasn’t suffocating at all. The color was true and I loved it. I like the style of the slit, it was the perfect balance of sexy but not showing your private ! Hope this helps ! Read more
items.author: Mariah Buenrostro

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Quality not as expected but could work for less for formal needs
items.body: TBH, I was expecting more from this dress from the photos and the price. I felt the fit was accurate, however the material is thin and felt cheap. It didn’t seem as formal or dressy for the occasion I was purchasing for. It was stretchy and could be dressed up with jewelry I suppose, but I would only order a darker color if doing that. I was disappointed and returned it. Read more
items.author: Lindsay S

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Ruched Cocktail Long Sleeve Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Ruched Cocktail Long Sleeve Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Khaki, Blue, Dark Grey, Army Green, Dark Blue, Black, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
